name: Slashem (Nethack) exclusive dev version
short_description:
This is an exclusive compilation for Slash'em (Nethack variant) for Windows platform. Current version is 0.0.8E0F1. Not published on official site.

In this version: • many bugs fixed by developers (see slashem.org) • hardcore ascii text-only, no graphics, no sound • MAIL option (daemon will bring funny rumors) • item weight shown in inventory by default • damage amount shown by default • autopickup turned off by default • boulders are shown as "0"

The purpose of this project is to make the last developers' Slashem version available to everyone who would like to play it but cannot compile it.
